props.itemType: Designates the key on the supplied items that is used for determining the nodes type.
props.activatable: Designates whether the list items are activatable.
props.disabled: Puts all children inputs into a disabled state.
props.inactive: If set, the list tile will not be rendered as a link even if it has to/href prop or @click handler.
props.lines: Designates a **minimum-height** for all children `v-list-item` components. This prop uses [line-clamp](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/-webkit-line-clamp) and is not supported in all browsers.
props.link: Applies `v-list-item` hover styles. Useful when using the item is an _activator_.
props.nav: An alternative styling that reduces `v-list-item` width and rounds the corners. Typically used with **[v-navigation-drawer](/components/navigation-drawers)**.
props.subheader: Removes the top padding from `v-list-subheader` components. When used as a **String**, renders a subheader for you.
props.slim: Reduces horizontal spacing for badges, icons, tooltips, and avatars within slim list items to create a more compact visual representation.
props.collapseIcon: Icon to display when the list item is expanded.
props.expandIcon: Icon to display when the list item is collapsed.
props.selectable: Designates whether the list items are selectable.

events.click:activate: Emitted when the list item is activated.
events.click:open: Emitted when the list item is opened.
events.click:select: Emitted when the list item is selected.
events.update:activated: Emitted when the list item is activated.
events.update:opened: Emitted when the list item is opened.
events.update:selected: Emitted when the list item is selected.

slots.subheader: Removes the top padding from `v-list-subheader` components. When used as a **String**, renders a subheader for you.

exposed.children: The nested list items within the component.
exposed.getPath: Get the position of an item within the nested structure.
exposed.parents: The parent list items within the component.
